description:
Promising to impress from the moment you arrive, the home effortlessly blends characteristic charm with fresh, modern updates behind a curtain of palms and garden in a character filled quiet cul-de-sac.

Inside, beautiful details such as timber floors, high ceilings and decorative detail feature throughout.

Continuing from the residence's welcoming entry and front veranda is a generous living area, formal dining room featuring encased windows and a sleek contemporary kitchen boasting ample bench-space and stainless-steel appliances.

Two well-sized bedrooms can be found off the living area with either air-conditioning or ceiling fan.
Finalising the bedrooms is a sizeable master room with ensuite bathroom, plus well-appointed main bathroom encompassing large glass shower, modern tiling and vanity.

Finishing the home is a separate laundry out back with built in storage options and door to yard.

Benefitting from a secure lock up garage and vast amounts of under-house storage with second lock up storage garage (this also has potential to be converted into a separate home office), the property also includes split-system air-conditioning and ceiling fans. The yard is fully fenced making it safe and secure for children and pets with established gardens front and back you can keep or make it your own.

Close to Yeronga Memorial Park's playgrounds, the Yeronga train station, Fairfield Gardens Shopping Complex and a plethora of shops and dining options, this exceptional residence falls within the Yeronga State School and Yeronga State High School catchment areas. Saint Sebastian's Primary School, Mary Immaculate Primary School and Our Lady's College are also nearby.

Take advantage of the proximity to Brisbane River for walking, cycling and running paths.
This is a beautiful cottage with great street appeal that you would be very proud to call home.
Do not delay call to arrange an inspection today.

Information contained on any marketing material, website or other portal should not be relied upon and you should make your own enquiries and seek your own independent advice with respect to any property advertised or the information about the property.

461m2 Corner Allotment
Rental Estimate - $700 per week minimum
Council Rates - $510 per quarter
Charming Character Home
Landscaped Gardens
Surrounded by parklands
Yeronga School Catchments
Lock up garage
Air-conditioning throughout
